LanguageData.RunWild_Westerado.label: running wild
LanguageData.RunWild_Westerado.beginLetter:
{0} is fed up with civilization.

[PAWN_pronoun] realized that wild creatures are always free. So, [PAWN_pronoun] has decided to leave your faction and live with the animals.

You can attempt to tame or arrest [PAWN_possessive] to get [PAWN_possessive] back
LanguageData.RunWild_Westerado.recoveryMessage: {0} has had a change of heart and is coming back to the colony.
